com.plotsquared.iserver.views

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plotsquared.iserver.views.RequestHandler
      • com.plotsquared.iserver.views.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSView, DownloadView, Error, Exception, HTMLView, ImgView, JSView, LessView, RedirectView, StandardView

    public class View
extends RequestHandler
    These are the view management classes. Essentially, these are how the server is able to output anything at all!
